testcase.name: Login With Empty Email / password ( Invalid.1)
testcase.system-out: Given User open the browser and navigate to Login Page......................passed When Leave Email and Password Fields Empty..................................passed And User click on Login Button..............................................passed Then User Still on Login Page...............................................passed And Login Fail with error message Field required user pass..................passed

testcase.name: Login With Valid User_Name and wrong Password ( Invalid.2 )
testcase.system-out: Given User open the browser and navigate to Login Page......................passed When Enter valid user_name which is "Admin" with Wrong Password which is "ADMIN123".passed Then User click on Login Button.............................................passed And User Still on Login Page................................................passed And Login Fail with error message Invalid credentials.......................passed

testcase.name: Login With Invalid User_Name and Valid Password ( Invalid.3 )
testcase.system-out: Given User open the browser and navigate to Login Page......................passed When Enter Invalid user_name which is "AdminAdmin" with Valid Password which is "admin123".passed Then User click on Login Button.............................................passed And User Still on Login Page................................................passed And Login Fail with error message Invalid credentials.......................passed

testcase.name: Login With Missing mandatory field password ( Invalid.4)
testcase.system-out: Given User open the browser and navigate to Login Page......................passed When Enter Valid user_name which is "Admin" with Empty Password.............passed Then User click on Login Button.............................................passed And User Still on Login Page................................................passed And Login Fail with error message Field required pass.......................passed

testcase.name: Login With Missing mandatory field UserName ( Invalid.5)
testcase.system-out: Given User open the browser and navigate to Login Page......................passed When Enter Valid Password which is "admin123" with Empty UserName...........passed Then User click on Login Button.............................................passed And User Still on Login Page................................................passed And Login Fail with error message Field required user.......................passed

testcase.name: Login with valid data ( User_Name / Password ) ( Valid.6)
testcase.system-out: Given User open the browser and navigate to Login Page......................passed When Enter Valid user_name which is "Admin" with Valid Password which is "admin123".passed Then User click on Login Button.............................................passed And Login Success and User directed to Dashboard Page.......................passed
